#summary Howto get started with grailsMDA.

= Get started =

1.) Download the latest *grailsMDA.jar* from http://code.google.com/p/grailsmda/downloads/list

2.) Download the latest sample *build.xml* from http://code.google.com/p/grailsmda/downloads/list

3.) Modify the "genpath", "modelpath" and "grailsMDA" properties in the *build.xml* so your model.xmi and the grailsMDA.jar can be found by the ant-run

4.) Run the "clean-build" task
